title: BoB, Bank of India cut repo-linked interest rate after RBI’s policy rate cut, others to follow suit
description: With cheaper funding, banks can lower lending rates such as MCLR and base rates, making home, auto, and business loans more affordable

title: Bank Of Baroda Cut Repo-Linked Interest Rate, Others To Follow Suit
description: Hours after the RBI slashed key policy rate, state-owned Bank of Baroda on Friday announced an interest rate cut on loans linked to repo rate by 25 basis points, a development to be followed by other lenders.
